A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Smoke is Smoke people...stop complaining. When we saw Return Of The Jedi\, the emperor was just the emperor\, he was in command and we knew less about him..The movie does an spectacular job and explaining the different dimensions and complexity of the dark side and good side of the force. Great script and terrifically acted by the cast. The Force Awakens was simply an experiment. The Last Jedi is majestic.
